com.chap.links.client
Class TreeGrid.Options

java.lang.Object
  AbstractDrawOptions
      com.chap.links.client.TreeGrid.Options
Enclosing class:
TreeGrid
public static class TreeGrid.Options
extends AbstractDrawOptions

Options for drawing the treegrid. Create an instance via the method create, for example TreeGrid.Options options = TreeGrid.Options.create();

setHeight

public final void setHeight(java.lang.String height)
Set the height for the treegrid in pixels or percentages. WHen height is set to "auto", the height of the treegrid is automatically adjusted to fit the contents.

Parameters:
height - Height as a string, for example "100%" or "500px", or "auto"
